sentences.en: Can you tell the difference between an ape and a monkey?
sentences.cn: 你能区分猿和猴 吗 ?

sentences.en: Early man shows certain affinities with the ape.
sentences.cn: 早期的人类和猿有某些相似之处.

sentences.en: He sensed the danger and leaped back with the agility of an ape.
sentences.cn: 他意识到有危险,又立即以猿猴一般的敏捷跳了回来.

sentences.en: Its rate of growth was fast — much more like that of an ape than that of a human.
sentences.cn: 它的发育速度很快——更像猿，而不像人。

sentences.en: Look at yourself, you're just like an ape when you're in bed.
sentences.cn: 你瞧瞧自己这副德性, 睡在床上不折不扣象头人猿.

sentences.en: Man evolved from the anthropoid ape.
sentences.cn: 人是从类人猿进化而来的。

sentences.en: Man has evolved from the ape.
sentences.cn: 人是从类人猿进化而来的.

sentences.en: Men are descended from ape - men.
sentences.cn: 人是由类人猿转变而来的.

sentences.en: Objective To study the relationship between action of acetic - � � - ( N - piperidine ) - ester ( Ape ) on snail - killing and calcium ion.
sentences.cn: 目的　研究乙酸β - 哌 啶 乙酯 ( Ape ) 的杀螺作用与Ca2+的关系.

sentences.en: Purpose: To evaluate the effectiveness of SCT in diagnosis of acute pulmonary embolism ( APE ).
sentences.cn: 目的 　 评价急性肺动脉栓塞 ( APE ) 螺旋CT( SCT)的诊断价值.

sentences.en: The murderer is a mixture of the tiger and the ape.
sentences.cn: 这个凶手既残暴,又狡猾.

sentences.en: The new finds have deepened our knowledge of giant ape.
sentences.cn: 新的发现物加深了我们对巨猿的认识.

sentences.en: To fully backup select Include APE in backup options.
sentences.cn: 这个完全备份选择包括了APE这个备份选项.

sentences.en: When Colonel Harper found out, he would go ape.
sentences.cn: 哈珀上校发现了一定会勃然大怒。

sentences.en: your kids will go ape over these frozen pops!.
sentences.cn: 你的孩子听了这些毫无感情的流行音乐会变得狂暴无礼的。

words.tran_cn: 愚蠢的；一味模仿的；像猴子的

phrases.tran_cn: 变得极兴奋，变得如痴如狂

trans.tran_en: an animal that is similar to a monkey but has no tail or only a very short tail
to copy the way someone speaks or behaves in order to make fun of them
to copy the way someone speaks or behaves in order to make fun of them
